long_description: Stay in charge of your day in these SunCloud Conductor sunglasses, featuring polarized lenses for reduced glare and 100% UV protection. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare for increased sharpness and decreased eye fatigue. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, injection molded polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Grilamid(R) TR90 lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility in all temperatures and are extremely impact resistant. Black Back Paint frames feature polarized gray lenses to eliminate glare without distorting colors in bright conditions. Tortoise frames feature polarized brown lenses to eliminate glare and enhance contrast in bright conditions. Megol nose pads and temple tips boost performance and grip during vigorous activity. 8-base-curve lenses; (the higher the number the more curved the lens-SunCloud features sunglasses with 6, 7, 8 and 9 base curvature). Sized to fit large faces.
short_description: Stay in charge of your day in these SunCloud Conductor sunglasses, featuring polarized lenses for reduced glare and 100% UV protection.
